content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-25.0, -64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-25.0, -64.0) connected to a Stone Furnace at position (-23.0, -66.0) via a transport belt.
- Wooden Chest at position (-24.5, -66.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -65.5) transferring items from a Wooden Chest at position (-21.5, -65.5) to a Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0).
- BeltGroup connecting the mining drill to the furnace.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with a Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items to the Wooden Chest.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting transport belts
- Ensure that the transport belts are correctly initialized and that all required attributes are set before attempting to connect them. This will prevent errors related to 'NoneType' object having no attribute 'tile_dimensions'.
